sources.title: Where's That Fire (1940)
sources.description: A bumbling fire crew is told to put out a fire successfully or they will be canned. Matters get complicated when their fire engine is stolen by crooks. PD In UK At GATT Date. Not Eligible For GATT Never registered in the U.S.

metadata.Plot: A hapless fire crew are given the ultimatum: put out a fire successfully or else be sacked. They fail miserably, and their ancient fire engine is stolen by criminals attempting to steal the crown jewels from the Tower of London.
metadata.Writer: Maurice Braddell, Marriott Edgar, Val Guest
metadata.Actors: Will Hay, Moore Marriott, Graham Moffatt
